name: facebook.com - hide right sidebar
description:
For new (March 2014) Facebook UI.

1. Hide right sidebar, increase main content width
2. Change some fonts to look like previous style
3. Hide "Related" and "Similar" blocks that pop out when you click on some posts
additional_info:
March 25, 2014 - changed "quoted" color from gray to dark green. It's uncomfortable to read gray on white.
2017 - added hiding for "install messenger app"
April 12, 2017 - Fixed content moving left after FB April 12th 2017 update
August 16, 2017 -  after FB update decreased left column (navigation) font size, comments font size,  number of likes font size
